scripts.dev: npx concurrently "yarn web:dev" "yarn workers:dev" "yarn events:dev" -k -n web,workers,events
scripts.web:build: yarn web:env && cd web && yarn build
scripts.web:dev: yarn web:env && cd web && yarn dev
scripts.workers:dev: yarn workers:env && cd workers && poetry run python -m uvicorn fund_public_goods.main:app --reload
